description: Unit test file for the PythonTools class in the agno.tools.python module, testing various methods such as file operations, code execution, and package installation.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Fixture that creates and yields a temporary directory for testing.

methods.name: python_tools
methods.description: Fixture that initializes a PythonTools instance with specific configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_save_to_file_and_run_success
methods.description: Tests successful saving and execution of Python code from a file.

methods.name: test_save_to_file_and_run_error
methods.description: Tests handling of syntax errors during code execution.

methods.name: test_save_to_file_and_run_no_overwrite
methods.description: Tests prevention of overwriting existing files.

methods.name: test_run_python_file_return_variable
methods.description: Tests retrieving a variable's value from a Python file.

methods.name: test_run_python_file_return_variable_not_found
methods.description: Tests handling of non-existent variables in a Python file.

methods.name: test_read_file
methods.description: Tests reading contents from a file.

methods.name: test_list_files
methods.description: Tests listing files in a directory.

methods.name: test_run_python_code_advanced
methods.description: Tests executing more complex Python code with functions.

methods.name: test_run_python_code_error
methods.description: Tests handling of syntax errors during code execution.

methods.name: test_pip_install_package_error
methods.description: Tests handling of errors during pip package installation.

methods.name: test_uv_pip_install_package
methods.description: Tests successful uv pip package installation.

methods.name: test_uv_pip_install_package_error
methods.description: Tests handling of errors during uv pip package installation.
